rewardDescription: Special attacks have a 50% chance to deal 50% more damage.

task: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl at depth 8 or deeper.
rewardDescription: Powerful boots combining all 3 Cerberus boots.
All special attacks cost 20% spec energy and have +100% accuracy.

task: Fully decorate a magic totem in the Auburn Valley.
rewardDescription: Provides unlimited elemental runes whilst equippep and has a passive effect where attacks will double an NPC's elemental weakness when applicable.

Select three combat skills. Whenever you gain XP in one of your chosen skills, gain 50% XP in the other two.

Available skills: Attack, Strength, Defence, Hitpoints, Ranged, Magic, Prayer
Always be on-task for all slayer monsters and unlock all slayer task perks for free.

task: Obtain a rare drop from Yama.
rewardDescription:
When damage would reduce you to 0 hp, you become invulnerable and are healed based on the damage dealt over the next 16 ticks (9.6 seconds).
Your combat stats are instantly boosted to 255 but begin draining rapidly back down.

task: Obtain a rare drop from Chambers of Xeric.
rewardDescription:
Choose one of the three mega rares from raids:
Scythe of Vitur, Tumeken's Shadow, Twisted Bow
Increase XP gain by 200% for all skills.

task: Obtain a rare drop from The Hueycoatl.
rewardDescription: While Guthix Sleeps
An experience lamp containing 25,000 XP to be used on any skill.

task: Cook a shark while weaing a chef's hat.
rewardDescription:
A shark that isn't consumed when eaten.
Heals a base of 20 hitpoints.
Monkey Madness II

task: Complete the Inferno in 30 minutes or less.
rewardDescription: Summon a powerful thrall lasting for 30 minutes. The guardian will attack your target with whatever style it is weak to and will AoE attack in multi-combat.
+1 to all combat masteries.

task: Obtain some valuables from a house in Varlamore.
rewardDescription:
• High and Low Level Alchemy spells have no rune cost or level requirements.
• Items give 15% more gold and have a 65% chance to not be consumed when the spell is cast.
• 20K coins can be offered at Prayer altars in exchange for Prayer XP equivalent to using a dragon bone.

task:
Obtain a rare unique from the Barrows chest
while wearing some Barrows equipment.
rewardDescription: Increase XP gain by 200% for all skills.

task: Drink a steamforge brew within the Stick Your Ore Inn.
rewardDescription: Receive a banker's briefcase, which can teleport to any deposit box, bank, or bank chest.

A choice from one of the following:
• Power Miner
• Lumberjack
• Animal Wrangler
+1 to all combat masteries.

task: Kill a lizardman shaman in the Lizardman Temple.
rewardDescription: Song of the Elves
Receive a banker's note, which allows players to use items on it to turn them into banknotes or unnote them.
Increase XP gain by 200% for all skills.

task: Gain over 30,000 coins from one alchemy spell.
rewardDescription: All items are processed at once when doing specific skilling activities, with a chance to make an extra product. Artisan skills also receive a +12 boost.

• Pickpocket all NPCs in an 11x11 square.
• 100% success rate on all Thieving checks.
• Auto re-pickpocket until you can no longer do so.
• Items obtained from pickpocketing are noted.
• Maximum coin pouch count increased by 3x.
Receive a pair of Sage's greaves, whichs grants Agility experience based on your Agility level while you run.

A choice from one of the following:

• Animal Wrangler

task: Equip any boots from the Stronghold of Security.
rewardDescription: Receive a fairy mushroom, which allows teleporting to any fairy ring, spirit tree, or tool leprechaun.
Sins of the Father
When gathering resources, find and store random grimy herbs, while also providing a small amount of Herblore experience when one is found.
+1 to all combat masteries.

task: Obtain a rare drop from Vorkath.
rewardDescription: Gives access to all prayers and spells regardless of area, quest, or diary requirements. Freely swap between all spellbooks at any time.

task: Witness the Gemstone Crab burrow away.
rewardDescription:

task:
Make a Zamorak brew while wearing Zamorak
monk robes in the Varrock chaos altar.
rewardDescription: Potions will no longer be consumed when used.

A tribrid helmet with no negative bonuses, that also functions as a slayer helm.
A light ranged weapon with a passive effect that rolls accuracy twice, similar to an Osmumten's Fang.

task: Equip a unique item from God Wars Dungeon.
rewardDescription: Stores the player's current tile coordinates, hp, prayer, and spec energy. Any time later, the player may use the crystal to teleport back to the stored coordinates while restoring their stats to the stored values.
+1 to all combat masteries.
Farming patches will grow instantly and never catch diseases, and have a 20% chance to save the seed or sapling that was planted.

task: Complete floor 5 of the Hallowed Sepulchre.

rewardDescription: Magic spells no longer require or consume Runes. This includes charges when using powered staves or tomes.

task: Deposit a skillcape into your player owned house.
rewardDescription: Acts like a permanent ring of recoil. Reflect 25% of the damage you receive.

task: Defeat the lesser demon in the Wizards' Tower.
rewardDescription: Your Melee, Ranged and Magic hits will never deal below 5 damage. You can still miss your attacks.
